SELECT a.send_time AS `time`, IFNULL(b.userSendMessageCnt, 0) userSendMessageCnt, IFNULL(b.customerSendMessageCnt, 0) customerSendMessageCnt, IFNULL(b.chatCustomerCnt, 0) chatCustomerCnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT send_time FROM we_user_customer_message_statistics WHERE corp_id = #{corpId} AND send_time BETWEEN #{sendStartTime} AND #{sendEndTime}) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL( SUM( ucms.user_send_message_cnt ), 0 ) AS userSendMessageCnt, IFNULL( SUM( ucms.external_user_send_message_cnt ), 0 ) AS customerSendMessageCnt, ucms.send_time, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT ucms.external_userid), 0) AS chatCustomerCnt FROM we_user_customer_message_statistics ucms LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.corp_id = ucms.corp_id AND wu.user_id = ucms.user_id AND wu.is_activate = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@WE_USER_IS_ACTIVATE} WHERE
${params.dataScope} GROUP BY ucms.send_time ) b ON a.send_time = b.send_time ORDER BY a.send_time

SELECT a.send_time AS `time`, IFNULL(b.userSendMessageCnt, 0) userSendMessageCnt, IFNULL(b.customerSendMessageCnt, 0) customerSendMessageCnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT send_time FROM we_user_customer_message_statistics WHERE corp_id = #{corpId} AND send_time BETWEEN #{sendStartTime} AND #{sendEndTime}) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL( SUM( ucms.user_send_message_cnt ), 0 ) AS userSendMessageCnt, IFNULL( SUM( ucms.external_user_send_message_cnt ), 0 ) AS customerSendMessageCnt, ucms.send_time FROM we_user_customer_message_statistics ucms LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.corp_id = ucms.corp_id AND wu.user_id = ucms.user_id WHERE
${params.dataScope} AND wu.is_activate = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@WE_USER_IS_ACTIVATE} GROUP BY ucms.send_time ) b ON a.send_time = b.send_time ORDER BY a.send_time

SELECT ucms.user_id, wu.`user_name`, wd.`name` departmentName, wu.`head_image_url` userHeadImage, IFNULL(SUM(ucms.user_send_message_cnt), 0) AS userSendMessageCnt, IFNULL(SUM(ucms.external_user_send_message_cnt), 0) AS customerSendMessageCnt, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT ucms.external_userid), 0) AS chatCustomerCnt FROM we_user_customer_message_statistics ucms LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.user_id = ucms.user_id AND wu.corp_id = ucms.corp_id LEFT JOIN we_department wd ON wd.id = wu.main_department AND wd.corp_id = wu.corp_id WHERE
${params.dataScope} AND wu.is_activate = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@WE_USER_IS_ACTIVATE} GROUP BY ucms.user_id ORDER BY customerSendMessageCnt DESC

SELECT ucms.external_userid, wc.`name` externalUserName, wc.`avatar` externalUserHeadImage, ucms.user_id, wu.`user_name`, wd.`name` departmentName, IFNULL(SUM(ucms.user_send_message_cnt), 0) AS userSendMessageCnt, IFNULL(SUM(ucms.external_user_send_message_cnt), 0) AS customerSendMessageCnt FROM we_user_customer_message_statistics ucms LEFT JOIN we_customer wc ON wc.`external_userid` = ucms.external_userid AND wc.corp_id = ucms.corp_id LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.user_id = ucms.user_id AND wu.corp_id = ucms.corp_id LEFT JOIN we_department wd ON wd.id = wu.main_department AND wd.corp_id = wu.corp_id WHERE
${params.dataScope} AND wu.is_activate = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@WE_USER_IS_ACTIVATE} GROUP BY ucms.external_userid ORDER BY customerSendMessageCnt DESC
